'''Reckless Aranara''' are part of the [[Aranara]] located in various areas of [[Dharma Forest]], [[Sumeru]].

There is a total of 14 Reckless Aranara. They will only appear after completing the {{Quest|The World of Aranara}}. They are found near a group of enemies. They can only be interacted with after defeating the enemies.

After interacting with them, they will reward either {{Item|Mora|x=5,000}} and Sumeru [[Material]]s ×3, or {{Item|Adventurer's Experience|x=4}}. In most cases, they will leave a one-time investigation point behind.

==Location==
# West of [[Mawtiyima Forest]]. {{Enemy List|Hilichurl*4}}
# Southeast of Mawtiyima Forest, a little south of the pond. {{Enemy List|Fatui Pyro Agent*1}}
# [[Chatrakam Cave]], a little southeast of the [[Teleport Waypoint]]. {{Enemy List|Hilichurl*3;Pyro Hilichurl Shooter*2}}
# West of [[Sumeru City]]. {{Enemy List|Eremite Linebreaker*1;Eremite Sword-Dancer*1}}
# Northeast of [[Devantaka Mountain]], north of the [[Aeonblight Drake]]. {{Enemy List|Eremite Linebreaker*1;Eremite Axe Vanguard*1}}
# Northeast of Devantaka Mountain, northwest of the Aeonblight Drake. {{Enemy List|Eremite Ravenbeak Halberdier*1;Eremite Axe Vanguard*1}}
# Northeast of [[Port Ormos]]. {{Enemy List|Hilichurl*4}}
# [[Fane of Ashvattha]], southwest of the Teleport Waypoint, up a ledge. {{Enemy List|Pyro Abyss Mage*2;Hilichurl Fighter*1;Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard*1}}
# Northeast of [[Pardis Dhyai]], north of the Teleport Waypoint. {{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Handyman*1;Treasure Hoarders: Gravedigger*1}}
# Northwest of Pardis Dhyai. {{Enemy List|Hilichurl*2}}
# Mid-east side of [[Apam Woods]], northeast of the eastern Teleport Waypoint, underneath the large tree. {{Enemy List|Hydro Abyss Mage*2}}
# Southeast corner of Apam Woods, at the base of the waterfall. {{Enemy List|Cryo Abyss Mage*2}}
# Southeast of Apam Woods. {{Enemy List|Eremite Ravenbeak Halberdier*1}}
# South of [[Yasna Monument]]. {{Enemy List|Hilichurl*2;Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl*1}}

==Dialogue==
===Aranara #1===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the Reckless Aranara)
:'''Paimon:''' That's an Aranara, and they're calling for help! Hurry, we've gotta save them!

;(Defeat the enemies)
:'''Reckless Aranara:''' I'm... saved!

;(Talk to the Reckless Aranara)
:'''Reckless Aranara:''' I'm... saved!
:'''Reckless Aranara:''' Good Nara, you're welcome in Vanarana. Aranara will wait for you there!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Aranara #2===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the Reckless Aranara)
:'''Paimon:''' Paimon heard and Aranara over there. Let's go check it out.

;(Defeat the enemies)
:'''Reckless Aranara:''' Whoa, it's the Golden Nara! Thank you, Nara friend!

;(Talk to the Reckless Aranara)
:'''Reckless Aranara:''' Whoa, it's the Golden Nara! Thank you, Nara friend!
:'''Reckless Aranara:''' Time to get back to Vanarana... Golden Nara should visit too.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Aranara #3===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the Reckless Aranara)
:'''Paimon:''' An Aranara's been trapped. Let's go save them!

;(Defeat the enemies)
:'''Reckless Aranara:''' Thanks to the Nara friend...

;(Talk to the Reckless Aranara)
:'''Reckless Aranara:''' Thanks to the Nara friend...
:'''Reckless Aranara:''' Thank you, Nara. It's time for me to go. May [[Aramuhukunda]] watch over Nara.
{{Dialogue End}}
